author: danhaywood
msg: ISIS-14: more on runtime Oid versions; JDO ObjectStore's AuditingService
* the Oid's version support now also includes user and timestamp (optional, for info only)
* added auditing capability to IsisTransaction of dirty objects
* DataNucleus subclass of IsisTransaction integrates with AuditService provided by the JDO applib
* integrated use of log4jdbc for better SQL logging.

author: aharui
msg: Add mx_internal flag to RichEditableTextContainerManager to "hide" cursor so it doesn't intermittently show up in bitmaps.
This may cause other bitmap compares to fail if the baselines captured the cursor.  This should only be the case for Spark TextInput/TextArea/RichEditableText.

author: hboutemy
msg: Added an alternative: don't keep versioned plugin documentations

author: danhaywood
msg: ... to allow RootOid to comparisons itself against other, taking into account any version info.
